invalid_policy_names: Ticket being resolved must have someone assigned to the ticket.
Change requests with risk level 'Moderate' or higher cannot be scheduled on Fridays
Editing the assigned user for priority 1 incident ticket is not allowed unless there is no user assigned to the incident ticket
Incidents with priority 1 cannot be assigned to users who already have more than 3 priority 1 incidents
Assets that cost over $10000 cannot be transferred
Users with email domains outside company domain cannot be assigned admin roles. The company domain is skyfall.ai
